sentences.sentence: The construction of the windows, as well as glass porticoes is made from bleached timber.
sentences.translation: 窗框和玻璃门框在材质上均采用漂白木材。

sentences.sentence: How long shall we sit in our porticoes practising idle and musty virtues, which any work would make impertinent?
sentences.translation: 我们还要有多久坐在走廊中，实行这些无聊的陈规陋习，弄得任何工作都荒诞不堪，还要有多久呢？
